CustomField.description: Checks if Role Name is one of the types to include in Soft Credit rollups.
CustomField.formula: npsp__Role_Name__c = 'Funder - Soft Credit' || npsp__Role_Name__c = 'DAF' || npsp__Role_Name__c = 'Workplace Giving' || npsp__Role_Name__c = 'Sponsor' || npsp__Role_Name__c = 'Agency'
CustomField.label: Sys-Role Check
